title.narrative: 2020 CRRP Project - Rescuing Enterprises through Production Repurposing (REPR)

description.narrative: • Rescue 12 MSMEs by repurposing factories, basic textile machines, renting textile machines from other manufacturers who closed shop to manufacture textiles for health care workers as well as masks for the general public • On boarding an eCommerce marketplace with the already existing partnership between MasterCard and Kifiya- SMEs

participating-org.narrative: Kifiya Financial Technology Private Limited Company
